title: Pina Colada Pudding Shots!
directions: Whisk milk, vodka, pineapple rum, and pudding mix together in a bowl. Stir whipped topping into vodka mixture until mixture has a pudding-consistency. Spoon into shot glasses and refrigerate until set, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant coconut cream pie pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip), thawed
